Content: Those who know he pleasure of riding small bikes. Let's back up a little bit. born 1960 started riding 67 or 68. On a Honda like so Many of us. The Great American Revolution of learning about Freedom! I have had a few Bikes Mostly Honda's. But have tried and do like other Brands, Just not HD! Since 17' ive have 2 Indians. A Road Master & Chief. Both serve a specific purpose Roadmaster Wonderful Touring bike when by myself or wife on Back1 The Chief has a Side car for a different type of Traveling! One I Holly Embrace. The Hannigan has served me well! too! But I Bring this all up for in 20 I bought a Honda Monkey! More fun then 1 man can imagine! In 21 I bought The trail ( Red) With a Rack box secured on the back From ( Harbor Freight 12 x 16" it goes Everywhere! & Holds enough. I bought a Green one as a second with a little more Juice! I daily Shopper And a season Trailer with more the 15k on board. I live near Venice Fl & have taken her to Key west & Gainsville. Looking to try the TAT. in a few Months! Trans American Trails. Smaller is Better! Over 60 Still Riding!

Title: Not my 1st rodeo
Author: Kiltman
